title: TUESDAY - WEEK 7 MNF RECAP BEARS AT RAMS 2020
itunes:title: TUESDAY - WEEK 7 MNF RECAP BEARS AT RAMS 2020
description:
The NFC West continued to show why they are widely regarded as the best division in football (0:06) as the Rams took down the Bears on Monday Night Football. On the injury front, (0:56) the Browns with a devastating loss as Odell Beckham Jr is lost for the year after tearing his ACL. Hear from head coach Kevin Stefanski on what the loss means to his team (1:13). In Dallas (2:53), head coach Mike McCarthy's stint with the Cowboys off to a rough start, but EVP Stephen Jones believes in his head coach (3:14), while Cam Newton talks about righting the ship in New England (3:40). It was thrilling week in the NFL and Good Morning Football's Nate Burleson previews today's show as he'll bring you the best Toe Drag Swag from around the league (4:46)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
